attributes.action: Officially recognise Captain Tom Moore's fundraising achievements.
attributes.background: Captain Tom Moore should receive official recognition from the Government, in the form of an Honour, for the truly amazing amount of money he is raising for NHS charities.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
